details: This category includes observing whether workers are using the required PPE correctly and consistently.
This category involves observing whether workers are identifying and reporting potential hazards in the workplace.
This category includes observing whether workers are following safe work practices and procedures.
This category involves observing whether workers are prepared to respond to emergency situations and whether they are following emergency procedures.
This category includes observing whether workers are using equipment and tools safely and whether they are maintaining them properly.
This category involves observing whether workers are following environmental safety practices, such as properly disposing of hazardous materials and reducing waste.
